articles.title: Baskin-Robbins rolls out ‘Dinner Your Dessert' range with retro activation via Because
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: Baskin-Robbins has rolled out its new 'Dinner Your Dessert' range. The retro-themed activation was created with brand activation agency, Because. It leverages the nostalgia of old-school diners with roller-skating brand ambassadors decked out in retro uniforms offering passers-by 2,000 free Loaded Scoop Burgers by scanning a QR code.

articles.title: Stock Radar: NYKAA showing signs of momentum after 20% fall from the highs; what should investors do?
articles.author: Kshitij Anand
articles.summary: FSN E-Commerce Ventures (Nykaa) witnessed a breakout from falling trendline resistance in the mast week of March 2025. Short-term traders with a high-risk profile can look to buy the stock for a target of Rs 195 in the next few weeks.

articles.title: Photo Gallery: Easter egg hunt at All American Karate
articles.author: Kurt Steiss
articles.summary: Information about your activity on this service can be stored and combined with other information about you to build a profile about you. The profile can be used later to present content that appears more relevant based on your possible interests, such as adapting the order in which content is shown to you.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 MicroSD Express Cards
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: The Nintendo Switch 2 console has a 256GB internal storage. MicroSD Express cards are the Switch 2's chosen storage method. Samsung and SanDisk are developing Super Mario-themed microSD cards with a Super Mario theme. GameStop is entering the fray with its own branded microSD express cards. Samsung's 256GB microSD Express card briefly appeared for pre-order on major retail sites.

articles.title: Before you rage against the machine, rage against your brand book
articles.author: Nathan Jolly
articles.summary: Tom Wenborn is chief creative tinker at Thinkerbell. He advises marketers to create a clear and distinctive brand world for their AI-generated assets before they start using them for marketing purposes. He believes that in an AI-powered future, the brands that win will be the ones with the most coherent, recognisable ideas.

articles.title: Why The Pixel 10 Pro Is Your Blueprint For The Future
articles.author: Ewan Spence
articles.summary: Google's Pixel phones are the most popular Android devices. The Pixel 10 Pro will be the first to bring Google's new AI technology to the public market. It will be released at Google I/O developer conference next month. It is the only Android phone that uses Google's Tensor chip for AI.

articles.title: 33 Newer Products From Beloved Beauty Brands That You Might Not Know About Yet
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Laneige's Neo Blurring Powder absorbs oil and blurs pores. Medicube's Turmeric Overnight Wrapping Peel Off Mask is already a TikTok sensation. Olay's Super Serum Body Wash is hydrating and moisturizing. Eos' Cashmere Skin Collection Shave Oil is moisturizing and effective.

articles.title: Now Available: Samsung's Newest Smart TV with 8K AI Upscaling
articles.author: Jessica Fritsch
articles.summary: The 65″ Class Neo QLED 8K QN900F Vision AI Smart TV is now available. This model offers an immersive viewing experience with its minimalist design and nearly edgeless display. It has a screen size of 65 inches and a diagonal of 64.5 inches. It features an 8K resolution of 7,680 x 4,320 and a refresh rate of 120Hz.

articles.title: Volkswagen responds to criticism around ID.4 and ID.5 delays
articles.author: James Wong
articles.summary: The previous generation of the car had 75% less torque than the current generation. It's not the right product for the European market. It will work in other markets.       in Europe.  It's the reason it's not available in Europe now.

articles.title: One Nintendo Switch 2 Component Is Two Steps Forward, One Step Back
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Nintendo Switch 2 is finally getting a full reveal. It's clear how much the console is an improvement over the original Nintendo Switch and it's good enough to play on the Switch 2 console. It will be released on April 26th. It costs $60.

articles.title: New shop in Northampton selling açai bowls and waffles
articles.author: Beck Wehner
articles.summary: Berry & Batter opened on Main Street in Northampton on Saturday. The shop is owned by Salim and Fatema Abdoo, who hope to franchise their business and expand with more locations. The menu was created by Fatema, who was inspired to start the business after traveling around the world.

articles.title: From AI agent hype to practicality: Why enterprises must consider fit over flash
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: As we step into the era of autonomous transformation, AI agents are transforming how businesses operate and create value. However, most organizations don't focus on how AI can apply to value already created and focus on the narrow overlapping sliver in the Venn diagram below.

articles.title: Opinion: Renting our lives the new norm
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: The rise of the subscription economy has fundamentally altered the way we consume. Subscriptions offer flexibility, convenience and cost savings. However, they can drain personal finances. The shift from ownership to access means we are tied to a system of recurring payments with little control over the terms of engagement.

articles.title: Qvest unifies global operations under single brand
articles.author: Jörn Krieger
articles.summary: Qvest, a global provider of media-focused services, has announced a strategic rebranding. The move consolidates the company's international operations under a single, unified brand. The new corporate purpose is 'We redefine the possible'. Qvest continues to provide a range of services including Change Management, Foresight & Innovation, Applied AI, and Customer Experience.

articles.title: The customer pain paradox: Why ignoring journey friction costs millions
articles.author: By:
articles.summary: Uber's new CEO Dara Khosrowshahi immersed himself directly into the customer experience instead of relying on filtered reports or second-hand feedback. Starbucks CEO Laxman Narasimhan trained for six months as a barista before officially stepping into the role. McDonald's was blindsided by the healthy eating trend and lost market share to more responsive competitors.

articles.title: How to download Android apps outside of the Google Play Store
articles.author: Roger Fingas
articles.summary: The era of app store exclusivity may be coming to an end. Google Play Store and Apple App Store are de facto app sources on Android and iOS devices. To install an app from outside the Play Store, you'll need to download its APK file and allow installations from unknown sources. Always verify the reliability of APK sources.

articles.title: Nykaa projects strong Q4 revenue growth, driven by beauty segment
articles.author: ETtech
articles.summary: FSN Ecommerce, the parent company of fashion and beauty retailer Nykaa, expects to report consolidated net revenue growth in the low to mid-20% range year-on-year for the March quarter (Q4 FY25). For the full fiscal year ended March 2025, revenue growth is also projected in the mid to low 20% range. The beauty segment remained the primary growth driver, with gross merchandise value (GMV) expected to have grown in the 30% range, ahead of overall industry trends. The fashion vertical is expected to grow in the high teens. The company has been scaling up its quick commerce operations to meet rising demand for faster deliveries.

articles.title: Vivo Y29 4G: 6500mAh Battery & Price
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: The Vivo Y29 4G was released in Bangladesh in late February. It's a variant of the Y29 5G, which debuted in late 2024. The Y29 features a larger camera module and a battery with a 6,500 mAh capacity. It has a 6.68-inch LCD screen with resolution of 720 pixels and a 120Hz refresh rate. The camera has a 50MP main camera and a 2MP bokeh camera on the rear, and an 8MP camera housed in a punch-hole design on the front. The phone has a Schott protective glass, which Vivo claims is 64 percent stronger than previous generations of protective layers.

articles.title: ND Bighorn Sheep Population Stable
articles.author: dakotaedgeoutdoors
articles.summary: NDG&F releases a press release on its Facebook page.    ndgandf.com/news/releases/ndg&f-press-release-for-the-publication-of-ngdf-news.

articles.title: Top Lipstick Deals at Myntra Fashion Carnival (April 3rd - 8th)
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Don't miss out on the Myntra Fashion Carnival and grab the best lipstick deals for the season. Lakmé 9to5 Hya Matte Hydrating Smudge Proof Lipstick is a perfect choice for those who want long-lasting color without compromising on comfort. Maybelline Color Sensational The Loaded Bolds Lipstick provides a bold and vibrant color payoff in just one swipe.

articles.title: RingConn Gen 2 Air review: Runs rings around other budget smart rings
articles.author: Aakash Jhaveri
articles.summary: The RingConn Gen 2 Air is a cheaper version of last year's $299 RingConn's Gen 2 smart ring. It's one of the thinnest and lightest rings you can buy. The company has done a great job improving its companion app over the years.

articles.title: Putting Ninja's 5-Function Backyard Grill Through Some Heat
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Is this machine worthy of replacing your current grill, pizza oven, smoker, griddle and roaster? If so, do you want to replace it with this machine? If not, consider a different machine or a new grill, oven or griddle.

articles.title: Supermarket butter 'better than Lurpak' an it's 60% cheaper
articles.author: Shannon Brown Reporter
articles.summary: A recent study by Which? revealed the UK's top spreadable butter, with three supermarket own-brands outperforming Lurpak in both taste and price. According to the taste test, Aldi's Nordpak emerged as the top performer, surpassing even the popular Lurpak brand. M&S Lightly Salted Butter Blend secured the second spot. Waitrose Spreadable received the lowest score overall.

articles.title: Sky shoppers can snap up the new Google Pixel 9a for £16 a month
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: The Google Pixel 9a is set for UK release on April 10th. Sky is offering the phone for £16 per month. iD Mobile is offering a contract at £22.99 per month with an upfront cost of £59. Carphone Warehouse offers a variety of deals.

articles.title: Famous supermarket brand unveils sweet lineup
articles.author: Maurie Backman
articles.summary: Wonder Bread is introducing a new product line: snack cakes. Flowers Foods bought Wonder Bread and other brands from Hostess Brands for $360 million 10 years ago. The new products are reminiscent of the Hostess products we all know and love. Snack food sales are expected to reach $1.6 billion in 2023.

articles.title: Famous supermarket brand unveils sweet lineup
articles.author: Maurie Backman
articles.summary: In the days of lunch boxes and school cafeterias, Wonder Bread sandwiches were probably made with Wonder Bread. Many of us associate the brand with the classic white bread experience, a soft, fluffy sheet of goodness that graced not only lunch boxes, but also dinner plates.

articles.title: Xiaomi founder Lei Jun's viral video shows an inspiring transformation from hustler to icon — and the internet is obsessed
articles.summary: Lei Jun, the billionaire founder of Xiaomi, rose from humble beginnings to global tech stardom. The internet is captivated by a viral video showcasing his transformation from street marketer to a tech icon worth $44.6 billion. He is a congressman in China's National People's Congress and chairs Kingsoft and Shunwei Capital.

articles.title: Amazon Shoppers Are Using This Scrubber on Sinks, Stoves, and Even Sneakers
articles.author: Clint Davis
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff is one of Amazon's best-selling cleaning products. Its electric scrubber has been purchased more than 4,000 times in the past month. The Pink Stuff Miracle Scrubber Kit is $22 and comes with four brush heads. Black + Decker and Rubbermaid's electric scrubbers are also available.

articles.title: 90Hz display phone under 7k
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Tecno POP 9 is a powerful yet affordable smartphone under ₹6,000. It is a new smartphone from Tecno and is available in black and white colours. It has a screen resolution of up to 10 megapixels and runs on Android.

articles.title: 'I tried Oodie's new pyjamas for two weeks and this is why they're game-changing'
articles.author: Narin Flanders
articles.summary: Loungewear brand Oodie has launched a new range of temperature regulating pyjamas in the UK. They offer both heating and cooling options that aim to regulate your body temperature while you sleep. There are five different prints available, with each coming in a range of styles as well as hot and cold versions.

articles.title: Bargain supermarket butter is named better than Lurpak and it's 60% cheaper
articles.author: Emilia Randall
articles.summary: Aldi's Nordpak butter is better than Lurpak and 60% cheaper. M&S Lightly Salted Butter Blend came in second place and Morrisons Salted Spreadable came in third. Tesco Butterpak lost points due to its aroma and flavour. Waitrose Spreadable had the lowest score overall.

articles.title: Shark launches new UK product that's perfect for summer - and it's not a vacuum
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Shark launches new UK product that's perfect for summer - and it's not a vacuum cleaner. The firm has announced that its FlexBreeze HydroGo fan is now available in the UK. It's a powerful, cordless misting fan designed for both indoor and outdoor use. Dyson has also confirmed the launch of its new Purifier Cool PC1, which helps regulate room temperatures and filter the air simultaneously.

articles.title: ‘Genius' woman praised for ‘mind blowing', back-saving hack to avoid bending over while hanging the washing out
articles.author: Sarah Bull
articles.summary: Charly took to TikTok to share a clever hack to save her back when hanging out the washing. She used a bag for life with one of the handles around her neck and hung the washing on the line. Her TikTok has been watched almost 250,000 times.

articles.title: David Lammy should keep travelling by private jet
articles.author: The Daily Telegraph
articles.summary: "Is the PJ ready?" asks PJ. PJ is not yet ready.   "Yes".      .  ?   #   %   /   &   =   +   -

articles.title: Can Using a Dumber Phone Cure ‘Brain Rot'?
articles.author: Brian X. Chen
articles.summary: The Light Phone III, from a Brooklyn start-up, is a stripped-down phone that does barely anything. The newest version began shipping in March and is set for a broader release in July. There is no web browser, no app store, no Uber to hail a ride, no Slack, no social media, and no email. Max used the phone for a week.

articles.title: The Least Effective Way to Brand Your Real Estate Business: Your Name
articles.author: Bernice Ross
articles.summary: Bernice Ross is a nationally syndicated columnist, author and trainer on real estate topics. She believes that effective branding is the cornerstone of building a thriving real estate business. NextHome has the best real estate branding in the business with the tagline 'Welcome Home'.

articles.title: After Piyush Goyal's Startups Jab Stirs Debate, Support From boAT Founder Aman Gupta
articles.author: NDTV News Desk
articles.summary: Aman Gupta, co-founder of boAT, supports Piyush Goyal's speech at Startup Mahakumbh. Mr Goyal questioned whether India should be content with developing apps that deliver groceries or ice cream, especially when Chinese startups are investing in semiconductors, AI, EVs, and AI.

articles.title: Best-rated Front Load Washing Machines 7 KG (April 2025): From LG, Samsung, And More
articles.summary: Front load washing machines with 7 KG capacity are perfect for couples and small families. These washers come with multiple wash cycles and high RPM spin speed to ensure effective laundry cleaning. Explore some of the best washing machines from brands like LG, Samsung, Haier, and more.

articles.title: New Cooking Obsession: Ditch Your Air Fryer?
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: The Ninja Foodi PossibleCooker aims to streamline and elevate the entire cooking experience for busy American families. It is available for order on the brand's website for $199.99. The price reflects an attractive option for American consumers aiming to consolidate their kitchen gadgets and optimize their cooking experience.

articles.title: Theatererlebnis mit 'Romeo & Julia' in Perchtoldsdorf
articles.author: Maria Lanzendorf
articles.summary: Erfolgreiche premieres in France today. It's the first film of the Erfolgreichia series. It will be shown in cinemas around the world. It is directed by Jean-Claude Van Damme. It has a premiere in Paris.

articles.title: Will smartphone camera attachments ever be worth the hassle?
articles.author: Sam Byford
articles.summary: Xiaomi's concept is called the Modular Optical System and it involves self-contained camera modules that magnetically and wirelessly attach to your phone. The demonstration unit had a Micro Four Thirds-size sensor with a 17.5mm f/1.4 lens. It could attach to a Xiaomi 15 phone that had been outfitted with magnets and a window for laser data transfer.

articles.title: Best JRPGs On Steam Without DRM, Ranked
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: In a world of generative AI, chatbots and subscription services, it's easy to forget that there is also a subscription service for things that used to be one-off purchases, such as subscription services for things such as one-time-only purchases.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Fusion review: A smartphone for cash-strapped consumers
articles.author: Anuj Bhatia
articles.summary: Motorola Edge 60 Fusion is a mid-range Android smartphone priced at Rs 22,999. It's the first time Anuj Bhatia is reviewing a Motorola smartphone in this price segment. It has a 6.7-inch curved screen with 120Hz refresh rate and 4,500 nits peak brightness. The phone has IP68 and IP69 protection.

articles.title: Insights are better than ‘outrage'
articles.author: Anmol N Jain
articles.summary: Social media is abuzz with outrage on Minister Piyush Goyal's comments about food delivery apps and the Indian startup ecosystem. Serious readers should join Swarajya as they break down the challenges in a sober and in-depth manner away from noise, rage and clickbait.

articles.title: Midjourney v7 launches with voice prompting and faster draft mode — why is it getting mixed reviews?
articles.author: Carl Franzen
articles.summary: Midjourney has introduced a new version of its AI generator model, v7. The most advanced feature is a new way to prompt the model to create images. It's unclear whether it's a new voice input model (speech-to-text) from scratch or an out-of-the-box version of one from another provider.

articles.title: Genspark's Super Agent ups the ante in the general AI agent race
articles.author: Matt Marshall
articles.summary: Genspark has launched Super Agent, a general-purpose AI agent. It's built on a concert of nine different LLMs, more than 80 tools and over 10 proprietary datasets. It works well beyond traditional chatbots and handles complex workflows and returns fully executed outcomes.

articles.title: LOXEA introduces electric vehicles in Nigeria
articles.author: New Telegraph
articles.summary: LOXEA Nigeria, a subsidiary of CFAO Mobility, has introduced build your dreams (BYD) electric vehicles to the Nigerian market. The company is a pioneer in the deployment of electric vehicle solutions across the continent. It offers a comprehensive suite of services associated with electric vehicles, including the installation of electric charging stations, vehicle maintenance, repair services, and the provision of spare parts.

articles.title: First Legal Online Purchase Was in NH Over 30 Years Ago
articles.author: Lori Voornas
articles.summary: New Hampshire started e-commerce on August 11, 1994 when a friend sold a CD of Sting's Ten Summoner's Tales to another friend over the Internet. E-commerce sales are projected to pass $7 trillion by 2026. Amazon and eBay were founded a year later in 1995 and PayPal in 1998.

articles.title: Here's how much a fully-loaded 2025 Honda Odyssey costs
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: The Honda Odyssey is a plush minivan from Honda. It's feature-packed as standard, but we wanted to find out how much the ultimate Odyssey costs. Click here to read the full news article to read how much it costs to buy the ultimate Honda Odyssey.

articles.title: Penticton True Experience Market runs today
articles.author: Contributed
articles.summary: The True Penticton Experience Market will take place today, Sunday, April 5, from 10 a.m. to 3 p.m at the Pentictson Trade and Convention Centre. There will be over 50 local businesses and experiences on display, food and drink samples, a scavenger hunt for kids and prizes.

articles.title: I tried 50 cleaning hacks - these are the 9 that will change your life forever
articles.author: Ella Kipling
articles.summary: Georgia has tried 50 cleaning hacks and has found nine that have saved her time and energy. She recommends the following tips to her more than 135,000 TikTok followers: Dishmatic, bin, blender, lint roller, flash mop, deodoriser, and toothpaste.

articles.title: I tried a stand mixer £600 cheaper than my KitchenAid - I'll never use one again
articles.author: Sophie Harris
articles.summary: Kenwood's Kenwood Go stand mixer in Storm Blue costs £219. It's £600 cheaper than KitchenAid's 4.8L stand mixer, which she used for over 10 years. She used it to make mini egg brownies, cookies and bread.

articles.title: N.Y. Knicks 121, Atlanta 105
articles.author: The Daily Gazette
articles.summary: FGFTRebNEW is a new app for Android devices. It is free and available on Google Play. It's called "FGFTrebNEW" and it's available in English and Spanish. It can also be downloaded from Google Play as well.

articles.title: Roti, eggs and kopi: New exhibition celebrates Nanyang breakfast
articles.author: Straits Times
articles.summary: The breakfast of Singapore is an iconic Singaporean breakfast dish. It is made of eggs, bacon and vegetables. It costs around $3.50 per person per person. It's served for about 30 minutes.   Â   for breakfast in Singapore.

articles.title: 37 Fun Products You Probably Don't Need, But Sure Do Deserve
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Cremo's body wash and L'Oreal Paris Makeup Voluminous Lash Paradise Mascara are among the products that reviewers recommend to you. They are a Baccarat Rouge 540-inspired moisturizing body wash infused with white jasmine, red currant, and sweet amber and a buildable Lego cherry blossom.

articles.title: Niche To Rich: Startup Secrets For Thriving In Undiscovered Markets
articles.author: Rhett Power
articles.summary: There's a certain thrill in going where no one else is looking. Successful entrepreneurs find their footing in markets most people don't notice. John Conway, founder and CEO of Sparkling Bins explains how to turn a niche into a thriving business. He explains the three essential steps: identify strategically, navigate intentionally and adapt constantly.

articles.title: ‘Dead' UK town to be transformed with £135,000,000 project — including 464 homes
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: It's a new era for the new generation of people in the U.S. and it's a good time to start a new one. It's time for a new generation to start. It is a new time.      Â

articles.title: Sky Glass Gen 2 TV System Has 7 Key Upgrades Over The First Series
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Sky Glass Gen 2 is different from its predecessor from the moment you open the box. It's more powerful than the previous generation but not as good as it was before. It has a bigger screen and a better screen resolution than its predecessor. It also has a better battery life.

articles.title: Spider-Man: Brand New Day: everything we know about the MCU film so far
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: "Spider-Man: Brand New Day" is aiming to be one of the best films of the year. It's due to be released on March 25th.    "Brand New Day", starring Tom Holland, is directed by Peter Jackson.

articles.title: iPhone 16e Vs iPhone 16: What Do You Get For $200 More?
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: One is just enough for a phone, while the other adds major conveniences like MagSafe and ultrawide camera. iPhone 16e or iPhone 16, which one should you buy? Let us know in the comments below.    iReport.com.

articles.title: Notions and necessities: From dog shows to art fairs, unique Easter eggs and glitter eye shadow, it's all here
articles.author: Irish Independent
articles.summary: Necessity is the most important thing for a person to have in life. It's the only thing that matters.    nomenclature means "to have or to be of value".  nenomenclarity means "essential".
